text:
Great news for #Brampton Residents!
Use the long weekend to get the COVID-19 Vaccine! We must all work together to protect the community, & I urge you to get yourself and your loved ones vaccinated if eligible
#covid19 #covid #ᴠᴀᴄᴄɪɴᴇssᴀᴠᴇʟɪᴠᴇs #vaccine #ontario #onpoli https://t.co/gzS6Ooi5sw
